item.title: Recreating a Photostream With Immich and Python
item.description: Two posts within a week? That’s pretty much magical… I’ll need to have a look on why this happened ðŸ‘€. Talking about looking at things, one of the functions that Apple used to offer was a Photostream, which worked through iCloud and allowed you to view your photos from your mobile phone on your Mac. This felt seamless to me and allowed me to take a picture and handle it on my Mac. Apple discontinued it and now I’m stuck with images that are synced to my NAS (thanks Synology Photos!).
